<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Meditative Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=471) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 164 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Meditative Focus leads to...</title>
[Meditative Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=485)
